name: Easter Fools
description:
In the Year 2018 something... peculiar happens on Easter in Easterland!

April Fools land has begun to invade Easterland, it's up to you,  a bunny-suit clad hero welding a carrot-shooting Bazooka, to take on April Fools land armies before Easterland falls and Easter as we know it is never the same!

This is a still-in-development game made for My First Game Jam: Winter 2018 and Finally Finish Something 2018! We're hoping to be fully finished by Easter/April Fools Day 2018!

Thank you for playing!
